STUDENTID#+918770836919.title: DHANUSH - For CUET 2022
STUDENTID#+918770836919.description: CUET (Central University Entrance Test), is your doorway to a selected few top-ranked government colleges such as Delhi University and other top state universities for higher studies. It is relatively new to all students and many of you have doubts.                                                                      To address all of your doubts and to help you achieve your dream score, Scoreplus has come up with a full-fledged 'DHANUSH BATCH' for complete CUET preparation.                                                     The fee for the complete course is Rs 1999 only. But wait, there is a surprise coupon for further discount. Please use 'CHECKKARLO50' at the checkout. The coupon is valid till 7th June 2022 only. Get ready and mark the date, our flagship batch is launching on Saturday (11th June 2022).               Join the Course Today. For any assistance or queries, you can email us at support@scoreplus.live or call us on 8077303359.
key_features: Last minute prepration is the focus
Securing good marks is the target
